I have this in a few colors & look forward to putting one on each evening, they are very comfortable and keep me cool so  I can get things accomplished. They wash & dry well, so they are easy to care for.  I am very happy with this purchase.

I ordered the cashew/red initially and loved it, then the purple. The straps are adjustable. The pockets are handy. The loose structure is very comfortable, but not so large that you swim in it. My only issue is that the solid colors (I can only speak for the purple) are a stiffer cotton fabric than the printed styles. The cashew gown is very soft and lightweight, more like a viscose or jersey feel, whereas the solid purple is more like a thicker, stiffer cotton. I suspect it will soften with repeated washing, but after the first wash, it still felt very different from the much softer printed gown. Both are comfortable, and worth the purchase, but some people with fabric-feel issues will definitely note the difference and may not like the solid colors. I guess the fabric could change randomly between all styles, so be aware of that when purchasing.

I love the comfort of this night dress. Fits great. Soft material. Holds up in washer. I haven’t noticed any stretching. It’s medium weight material. You can wear it year round. It’s breathable. The color holds up nicely.

The only thing I regret is not scooping this up sooner. The material is nice and soft, and I love the length of this nightgown and the fact that it has pockets! Seriously, it has quickly become my favorite and go-to nightgown bc it's perfect 🥰
